name: Coinbase Transactions Getter
description: Tool for getting the transactions of a Coinbase wallet after restoring it
author: Shinkai

name.description: Identifier name for the Coinbase wallet to fetch transactions from

privateKey.description: Private key for wallet authentication. Must be a valid hex string

walletId.description: Specific wallet ID to get transactions for. Required for transaction history access

tableCsv.description: Transaction history in CSV format with headers. Each row represents one transaction

rowsCount.description: Total number of transactions (rows) in the CSV data, excluding header row

columnsCount.description: Number of columns in the CSV data representing different transaction attributes
